name: A Game About Electrons
description:
In this thrilling and exciting science trip you play as the electron Borb, on your way to achieve greatness and blow up a nuclear bomb. Many electrons have tried this and failed miserably, but you have the power of your proton friend, Jarck. Will you succeed in blowing up the earth, proving once and for all that together you can be strong, but when you separate you can cause some serious damage, and become the most famous quark(s) in the whole quark-world and beyond, or will you fail miserably and run home crying to your mama? Only you can find out.

Github
